message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000.  This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to see a price closer to $1,000,000. If you're serious about buying this product, I'm ready to negotiate, but let's get closer to that figure.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $950,000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need to stay within my budget.
